Registrar@peacelabyrinth.org ? ? ? ? Want to create a life of greater health, happiness and abundance?   Come join us as we learn practical keys for spiritual living to help align your life with your Soul?s purpose.?We'll explore breathing, chanting and a meditation technique called "spiritual exercises."? You can also walk the labyrinth and enjoy the meditation garden while you are here.? ?As a divine being, a Soul, you bring spiritual light and love into this world?. -John-Roger, D.S.S. ? >>>November & December Evenings Facilitated by Jackie Peterson, D.S.S. Jackie Peterson has facilitated students for over fifteen years offering?keys for increasing loving in their lives. Using her own life's experience she encourages students to use simple keys for greater peace, harmony and joy. She received her Doctor of Spiritual Science from Peace Theological Seminary and College of Philosophy in 2005.? ? ?
